problem.question: To keep bananas fresh longer, you should:
options: Wrap the stems of the bananas in plastic wrap to slow down ripening.
Wrap the entire bunch of bananas in plastic wrap to slow down ripening.

key_steps: Bananas release ethylene gas which causes ripening
Ethylene is primarily released from the stem area
Wrapping stems blocks ethylene release at source
Wrapping entire bunch traps ethylene around fruit, accelerating ripening

logic_requirements: Explains role of ethylene in ripening
Identifies stem as primary ethylene source
Understands why wrapping stems is better than whole bunch
